name: KB in GameLand
description:
KB was falling, when she landed she looked around. "This looks like the house of cards I built after Mommy's game last night." 

"How do I get out? Not sure but lets go play and see what we can find."

Will you please help KB get out?

Created by: Christie Pratt

I took some board game and other physical game parts and turned them into a platformer where the spinning child is looking for dice.

I created the sounds and music.

I created a character out of a particle system to look like a purple tornado which is how many adults feel that is how children at full speed look.

I also created: 

  •  maze out of playing cards
  • room of magnetic blocks
  • ball pit
